title: Help my toaster pls
body: So i've been playing league on a toaster for almost a year and had no problems at all [ 60 fps was ok ].Now recently my fps doesn't go higher than 30 , but in teamfights is horrible ..10 max..Now i know i need to get rid of it and buy a new one but it'll take some time . So is there any way to get my 60 usual fps back by idk , changing OS or something..Thx ! ^_^ {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
FPS issues can typically be caused by graphics drivers problems or corrupt/missing League files. When there are corrupt or missing files, the client will download them on demand, which causes stutters or FPS drops in the game. I recommend running through our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting), which addresses the most common fixes.

Let me know if any of these steps helped.
